card.name: Terror Pit
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Ten-Ton Crunch
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less.

card.name: Hell's Scrapper
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 5000 or less.

card.name: Hyperspatial Revive Hole
card.text: ■ Return a creature from your graveyard to your hand. ■ Choose one of the following. :► Put any number of psychic creatures that have total cost 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. :► Put a darkness psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Hyperspatial Emperor Hole
card.text: ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -2000 power until the End Step ■ Put a Darkness psychic creature that costs 9 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Zabi Demona, Dead Sea Treasure
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your Darkness or Fire creatures. If you do, put a Darkness or Fire psychic creature that costs 4 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Zabi Trash Train, Fuuma Devil
card.text: ■ Whenever your other Aliens are destroyed, you may draw a card.

card.name: Big Promo! Zabi Flower
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may return an Alien from your graveyard to your hand. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Big Promo! Zabi Flower
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may return an Alien from your graveyard to your hand. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Deis Rigel, Persistent Flame
card.text: ■ Psychic Link—At the Step#Step 2 (Draw) ■ This creature gets "Power attacker +1000" for each Alien in your graveyard.

card.name: Deis Rigel, Persistent Flame
card.text: ■ Psychic Link—At the Step#Step 2 (Draw) ■ This creature gets "Power attacker +1000" for each Alien in your graveyard.

card.name: Self-Destructing Gil Poser
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy this creature. If you do, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less.

card.name: Zabi Barrel, Western Doll
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards a card from their hand.

card.name: Bone Dance Charger
card.text: ■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ Charger
